document.full_text: a lawsuit filed in california this week accuses national drug-store chain walgreen co of unlawfully selling medical information gleaned from patient prescriptions, another front in the battle over personal information.
document.title: walgreen accused of selling patient data
lines_and_colors: a lawsuit filed in california this week accuses national drug-store chain walgreen co of unlawfully selling medical information gleaned from patient prescriptions, another front in the battle over personal information.
